3224.verse: قُل|Say,|50|64|765$لَّا|"No (one)|83|112|30$يَعْلَمُ|knows|61|90|742$مَن|whoever|76|104|76$فِى|(is) in|58|86|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|144|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth|111|125|352$ٱلْغَيْبَ|(of) the unseen|124|148|5611$إِلَّا|except|65|113|86$ٱللَّهُ‌ۚ|Allah,|56|104|123$وَمَا|and not|71|119|46$يَشْعُرُونَ|they perceive|111|159|88$أَيَّانَ|when|59|83|7046$يُبْعَثُونَ|they will be resurrected."|187|187|6277$

3226.verse: وَقَالَ|And say|73|90|1089$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|123|20$كَفَرُوٓاْ|disbelieve,|89|123|59$أَءِذَا|"What, when|105|139|9334$كُنَّا|we have become|132|166|4361$تُرَٲبًا|dust|66|83|9335$وَءَابَآؤُنَآ|and our forefathers,|153|225|12354$أَئِنَّا|will we|64|208|13274$لَمُخْرَجُونَ|surely be brought out?|170|242|13275$

3227.verse: لَقَدْ|Certainly,|83|94|3466$وُعِدْنَا|we have been promised|176|197|12353$هَـٰذَا|this,|59|80|248$نَحْنُ|we|62|83|103$وَءَابَآؤُنَا|and our forefathers|148|169|12354$مِن قَبْلُ|before.|92|102|250$إِنْ|Not|44|70|225$هَـٰذَآ|(is) this|71|124|248$إِلَّآ|except|65|118|86$أَسَـٰطِيرُ|tales|94|147|5506$ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|(of) the former (people)."|189|216|5507$

3232.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|114|713$رَبَّكَ|your Lord|82|115|586$لَذُو فَضْلٍ|(is) full of Bounty|135|168|2154$عَلَى|for|63|96|52$ٱلنَّاسِ|the mankind,|105|138|75$وَلَـٰكِنَّ|but|78|94|952$أَكْثَرَهُمْ|most of them|108|204|5560$لَا|(are) not|80|271|30$يَشْكُرُونَ|grateful.|105|200|6484$

3233.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|108|713$رَبَّكَ|your Lord|82|101|586$لَيَعْلَمُ|surely knows|105|124|13277$مَا|what|53|72|262$تُكِنُّ|conceals|78|97|13278$صُدُورُهُمْ|their breasts|113|132|3205$وَمَا|and what|82|92|46$يُعْلِنُونَ|they declare.|108|108|744$

3223.verse: Is He [not best] who begins creation and then repeats it and who provides for you from the heaven and earth? Is there a deity with Allah? Say, "Produce your proof, if you should be truthful."

3224.verse: Say, "None in the heavens and earth knows the unseen except Allah, and they do not perceive when they will be resurrected."

3225.verse: Rather, their knowledge is arrested concerning the Hereafter. Rather, they are in doubt about it. Rather, they are, concerning it, blind.

3226.verse: And those who disbelieve say, "When we have become dust as well as our forefathers, will we indeed be brought out [of the graves]?

3227.verse: We have been promised this, we and our forefathers, before. This is not but legends of the former peoples."

3228.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how was the end of the criminals."

3229.verse: And grieve not over them or be in distress from what they conspire.

3230.verse: And they say, "When is [the fulfillment of] this promise, if you should be truthful?"

3231.verse: Say, "Perhaps it is close behind you - some of that for which you are impatient.

3232.verse: And indeed, your Lord is full of bounty for the people, but most of them do not show gratitude."

3233.verse: And indeed, your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they declare.

3234.verse: And there is nothing concealed within the heaven and the earth except that it is in a clear Register.

3235.verse: Indeed, this Qur'an relates to the Children of Israel most of that over which they disagree.
